name: the only other sound's the sweep
name_original: the only other sound's the sweep
description:
instructions

  • use wasd, d-pad, or arrow keys to move around and interact
  • if the game isn’t responding click the title screen or game area.

notes

  • some swearing, mentions of drug abuse, but nothing excessive

credits

  • concepted, written, and developed by windbreak
  • game’s title from robert frost’s stopping by woods on a snowy evening. i couldn’t resist!
  • music is follow the light by jonny easton
